text.text: Temiskaming Testing Laboratories (TTL) Geochemistry Department offers a suite of assay/geochemical analytical services including but not limited to determination of precious metals (Au, Ag, Pd, Pt) by fire assay with instrumental and/or gravimetric finish, aqua regia, 4-acid digestion for multielement (Cu, Co, Ni, Pb, Cr and Zn) by AAS.
